title: Womens Embroidered Dress with V-Neck and 3/4 Sleeves Loose Fit Vintage Embroidery Babydoll Dress
description: Mini dress made of Rayon and Linen blend fabric, V~neckline and below the elbow length sleeves, Contrast embroidery details, the dropped shoulders and 3/4 sleeves provide a relaxed and comfortable fit
An elegant and stylish dress carefully designed with intricate embroidery and a flattering v-neckline, The 3/4 sleeves provide a sophisticated touch, making it suitable for any occasion

Live it up in the Arizona Embroidered Dress! This statement-making piece has got you covered for any occasion – the long wide bell sleeves, v neckline, multicolor embroidered details, and relaxed flowy fit lets you rock it both dressy and casual. Make a boho inspired statement in the Arizona Embroidered Dress! Perfect to pair with your favorite everyday sneakers or trendy cowgirl boots!

Embroidered Babydoll Dress is so beautifully made. The chic tunic style silhouette features a v-neckline and gorgeous embroidery all throughout the front. We love this piece paired with cowboy boots for lunch with friends or any of your weekend events. It's so forgiving and easy-to-wear. This piece comes with compliments guaranteed. Don't wait to wear it！

Nice and comfy short dress for casual outing, Our dress also features ruching detailing, which adds a unique texture to the overall design. The loose and relaxed fit ensures that you're comfortable all day long, while the easy pull-over style makes it a breeze to get dressed in the morning
